body: One of the best futa doujin tbh

This is one of those story's that deserve a new tag. Call it "Karma." Where either the person getting raped is being raped as justified revenge or the rapist gets punished. In this case the rapist gets punished and replaced by a more charismatic and sweeter rapist. Definitely refreshing to see a rape story that's not just the same old, "Insert innocent girl here who gets mindbroke and raped by some arrogant, fat,  piece of shit." 

Basically, this is some good shit. I'm giving it the seal of approval. Nice to see rape that's not a boner killer at the end.
Oh shit! I love both of them. >~<
Damn it I lov both of them
